reviews.review_msg: I took an upper div course with her that is right up her alley, so her teaching was TOP shape. I find her an excellent educator, and very helpful for extra help. And hey, she may not be your type, but I think she is pretty cute.

A true teacher. He place the real world at the students fingertip and does not talk from the ivory tower like 90% of most profs. He has worked his craft in the the real world and has given it back to the students of communications at SFU.
